info.title: Chat APP API
info.description: API documentation for Chat Application - A social media chat application with posts, comments, likes, friendships, and real-time messaging

post.description: Register a new user account and automatically log them in
Invalidate user session and log them out
Upload and update user's profile image

profile_image.description: Profile image file (jpeg, png, jpg, gif, max 2MB)

422.description: Validation error or incorrect current password

get.description: Get all conversations for the authenticated user with last message and unread count
Get all accepted friends for the authenticated user

get.summary: Get or create conversation with user
get.description: Get or create a conversation with a specific friend

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID to get/create conversation with

404.description: Friendship not found or not accepted

get.description: Get all messages for a specific conversation

403.description: Unauthorized - user not part of conversation

post.description: Send a message in a conversation

403.description: Unauthorized - user not part of conversation

post.description: Broadcast typing indicator to other users in the conversation

403.description: Unauthorized - user not part of conversation

post.description: Mark all unread messages in a conversation as seen

marked_count.description: Number of messages marked as seen

403.description: Unauthorized - user not part of conversation

get.description: Get list of suggested friends (users who were active yesterday and are not already friends)

post.description: Send a friend request to another user

user_id.description: ID of the user to send friend request to

422.description: Validation error or cannot add yourself as friend

403.description: Unauthorized - not the recipient of the friend request
Unauthorized - not the recipient of the friend request

get.description: Get all incoming and outgoing friend requests for the authenticated user

outgoing.description: Friend requests sent by the user

incoming.description: Friend requests received by the user

post.description: Mark a specific notification as read
Add a comment to a post

put.description: Update an existing comment (only by the comment owner)

delete.description: Delete a comment (only by the comment owner)

post.description: Like or unlike a post. If already liked, it will unlike it.

is_liked.description: Whether the post is currently liked by the user

likes_count.description: Total number of likes on the post

get.description: Get all posts from friends and self, ordered by creation date

put.description: Update an existing post (only by the post owner)

delete.description: Delete a post (only by the post owner)

get.description: Search for users by name or email

200.description: List of users matching the search query
